subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Alex Tagliani, a 37-year-old Canadian, grabbed the early pole for this year’s Indianapolis 500 with a four-lap qualifying average of 226.954 miles per hour.
snippet: Alex Tagliani, a 37-year-old Canadian, grabbed the early pole for this year’s Indianapolis 500 with a four-lap qualifying average of 226.954 miles per hour.
